name: Save The Maid - Rescue Puzzle
description:
Do you like using your brain to escape tricky situations? Do you like saving ladies? Do you want to solve interesting puzzles? Then this game is for you!

Welcome to Save the Maid - Girl Rescue Puzzle! Here you have to solve unusual cases and help the girl escape from dire situations! You think it's easy, huh? Well, those puzzles do require thinking outside the box! Keep in mind that sometimes, the obvious option isn't the right one! So think carefully about your choices - they have consequences!

This game has an exciting and nonlinear story, tricky puzzles, and each scenario will require your IQ and wit to solve!

HOW TO PLAY:
It's pretty simple! You pick the right answer - you complete your challenge - the maid proceeds to the next level! Get it wrong - and it's game over for you!

GAME FEATURES:
- Tons of tricky puzzles with quirky solutions
- Beautiful 2D graphics
- Non-linear story
- Simple and addicting gameplay
- Intuitive controls

And, more importantly, this game is absolutely free! You can download Save the Maid - Girl Rescue Puzzle and start solving puzzles right now! So what are you waiting for?
